sentences.en: Do not come near my mother or her fiance!
sentences.cn: 不要接近我的妈妈或者她的未婚夫!

sentences.en: Do you really want to sit here and watch me and my fiance make out?
sentences.cn: 你真打算在旁边看我和我未婚夫亲热 吗 ?

sentences.en: Girl home is ordered close, even if had fiance, discovered husband's family.
sentences.cn: 姑娘家一订亲, 就算有了未婚夫, 找到了婆家.

sentences.en: Her fiance & 1 & sported a neat ginger moustache.
sentences.cn: 她的 未婚夫 留着触目的姜黃色小胡子,修剪得很整齐.

sentences.en: It was her fiance that I knew nothing about.
sentences.cn: 给她打电话的是她的未婚夫——我完全不知道有这号人.

sentences.en: It was very unfortunate that her fiance died before marrying her.
sentences.cn: 她很命苦,刚到十六岁就当了望门寡.

sentences.en: My fiance and I will tie the knot next April.
sentences.cn: 明年四月我将与未婚妻步上红毯.

sentences.en: My fiance is the most handsome man in the world.
sentences.cn: 我的未婚夫是世界上最帅的男人.

sentences.en: Never, never any expensive gift, even from your fiance.
sentences.cn: 凡是贵重礼物, 哪怕是你的未婚夫送的,都千万不能接受.

sentences.en: Saunders was the influential chairman of the Sequoia Clubs Fiance Committee.
sentences.cn: 桑德斯是红杉俱乐部财务委员会的举足轻重的主任委员.

sentences.en: She is the aggrieved person whose fiance & 1 & did not show up for their wedding.
sentences.cn: 她很委屈,她的 未婚夫 未出现在他们的婚礼上.

sentences.en: She was at a meeting with her fiance, the folk singer.
sentences.cn: 她正在同她那位当民族歌手的未婚夫幽会.

sentences.en: Since the engagement, my fiance has been a little nervous.
sentences.cn: 自从订婚后, 我的未婚夫便开始有点紧张.

sentences.en: The girl impressed her fiance's relatives with her sense of humor.
sentences.cn: 这个女孩以其幽默感给她的未婚家的亲属们留下深刻的印象.

sentences.en: Woman: They are. My fiance is the leader of the orchestra.
sentences.cn: 女: 是很 短 ,我的未婚夫是这个管弦乐团的指挥.
